title: Lesson 025: My Daily Phrase German
description: Learn German step by step, day by day, phrase by phrase. In today's show you'll learn to ask if you can leave your luggage in the hotel temporarily on checking out. Spend 5 minutes with us and gain confidence in speaking German with our 20-week course. You can automatically download each new episode for free by subscribing in iTunes. Please visit our website for more information.
